column1: Vechelde (German: Bahnhof Vechelde) is a railway station located in Vechelde
column2: Germany. The station is located on the Hanover–Brunswick railway. The train services are operated by WestfalenBahn.

column1: The station is served by the following service(s):
Regional services RE 60 Rheine - Osnabrück - Minden - Hanover - Braunschweig
Regional services RE 70 Bielefeld - Minden - Hanover - Braunschweig
